text: New Zealand participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The New Zealand squad consisted of 54 athletes competing in 16 sports: aquatics (swimming), athletics, badminton, basketball, boxing, cycling, equestrian, field hockey, judo, rowing, sailing, shooting, table tennis, triathlon, weightlifting and wrestling.http://www.olympic.org.nz/nzolympic/games/singapore-2010 ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport ! Event !
